WorkItem.Description:
The current implementation of static method will create a local closure with the same name of the method. While some keywords like "try" are valid method names but not valid variable names. This will create some difficulties when trying to use these keywords as static method names.

Note that using a keyword as a non-static method name works fine now.

Please either allow it or give a compile error on it.
WorkItem.Summary: Allowing keywords as static method names.
